column5: They're doing a bundle to stop people from buying one and raising the price mate. The whole reason that there aren't any switches rn. :/

I know this was posted a while ago, but I literally apologize for how much I apologize. It's really annoying, but I'm glad to know I'm not the only one. I think I do it because I think I'm always in the way/screwing things up if that makes sense.
